content.html: A lot of people in their 20s have internalized the idea that if they didn't master something as a child, then it's too late and useless to try. Culturally, we probably overemphasize the child prodigy and underemphasize success at other ages.
content.value: A lot of people in their 20s have internalized the idea that if they didn't master something as a child, then it's too late and useless to try. Culturally, we probably overemphasize the child prodigy and underemphasize success at other ages.
